value:
$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain2|No matter how many we cut down,
they keep coming. Thórr's army
will outlast us at this rate.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|We're definitely losing the endurance
battle. Let's fall back and regroup.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|We can't just yet, Commander. We've
got an allied detachment still fighting
in the western basin.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|But that's where the enemy is
reinforcing its... Oh, no...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|We have to warn them or they'll be
outflanked and surrounded!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|We cannot abandon our allies, but at
the same time...we are barely holding
our own here.$k$p$WmMPID_暴走アシュナード,ch09_15_Ashnard_M_Dark,Face|I will deal with this.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain2|King Ashnard?$k$p$WmMPID_暴走アシュナード,ch09_15_Ashnard_M_Dark,Face|Your stragglers are nearly overrun
by superior forces, yes? I will ensure
their escape.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Normal2|You...truly wish to rescue them?
All on your own?$k$pWhile it would be a noble errand, it is
surely too dangerous a request to
make of a king.$k$p$WmMPID_暴走アシュナード,ch09_15_Ashnard_M_Dark,Face|Heh. You misunderstand. The safety
of your people is incidental. I am only
looking for suitable prey.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|I see. That...is one way to look at this,
I suppose.$k$p$WmMPID_暴走アシュナード,ch09_15_Ashnard_M_Dark,Face|My troops and I will lay waste to the
enemy. Take the main force and
retreat as planned.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Normal2|Your...advice is appreciated, but I
insist that we return to support you
once we have regrouped.$k$p$WmMPID_暴走アシュナード,ch09_15_Ashnard_M_Dark,Face|Hmph. Do as you will. Now, Thórr...
Let us see if you can live up to your
reputation as a war god!$k$p
